title: Need help with game-breaking league error.
body: Everything runs smoothly from login to champ select but as soon as the loading screen is about to pop up it bug splats. have tried reinstalling twice to no avail. any help would be greatly appreciated :)

replies.body: I know you've already tried a reinstall, but there may be other issues like drivers and hardware failing to render the game properly.  I suggest going over every step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to rule out possibilities and fix this up for good.  Let me know if you have any questions.
after trying basically Everything on the list it still crashes. any ideas?

If the steps in the guide didn't help, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to download a set of logs to attach to your ticket.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
